screen.Settings.ProjectSettings.YourTeam.message: Make sure both devices are on the same version of Mapeo
Make sure both devices are on the same wifi network
As a Coordinator this device can invite and remove users, and manage project details.
As a Participant this device can take and share observations. They cannot manage users or project details.
You are selecting a role for this device:

screens.AboutSettings.CoMapeoType.description: Label for CoMapeo type/variant (e.g. QA for testing vs normal version of app)

screens.AboutSettings.unknownValue.description: Shown when a device info (e.g. version number) is unknown

screens.AppPasscode.ConfirmPasscodeSheet.description: used to indicate to the user what the new passcode will be.

screens.AppPasscode.ConfirmPasscodeSheet.message: Hifadhi Nambari ya siri ya Programu
Nambari za Siri za Programu haziwezi kurejeshwa ikiwa zimepotea au kusahaulika! Hakikisha umeandika nambari yako ya siri katika eneo salama kabla ya kuhifadhi.

screens.AppPasscode.NewPasscode.InputPas.message: Weka Nambari ya siri ya Programu
Haiwezi kutumika kama Nambari ya siri
Nambari hii ya siri itahitajika ili kufungua Programu ya Mapeo

screens.AppPasscode.NewPasscode.Splash.t.message: Nambari ya siri ya Programu ni nini?

screens.AppPasscode.PasscodeIntro.descri.message: Nambari ya siri ya Programu hukuruhusu kuongeza safu ya ziada ya usalama kwa kukuhitaji uweke nambari ya siri ili ufungue programu ya Mapeo. Unaweza kufafanua nambari yako ya siri yenye tarakimu 5 kwa kuwasha kipengele kilicho hapa chini.

screens.AppPasscode.PasscodeIntro.warnin.message: **Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa nambari za siri zilizosahaulika haziwezi kurejeshwa!** Kipengele hiki kikiwashwa, ukisahau au kupoteza nambari yako ya siri, hutaweza kufungua Mapeo na utapoteza ufikiaji wa data yoyote ya Mapeo ambayo haijasawazishwa na washiriki wengine wa mradi.

screens.AppPasscode.TurnOffPasscode.chan.message: Badilisha Nambari ya siri ya Programu

screens.AppPasscode.TurnOffPasscode.curr.message: Kwa sasa unatumia Nambari ya siri ya Programu. Tazama hapa chini ili uache kutumia au ubadilishe nenosiri lako.

screens.AppPasscode.TurnOffPasscode.desc.message: Nambari ya siri ya Programu huongeza safu ya ziada ya usalama kwa kukuhitaji uweke nambari ya siri ili ufungue programu ya Mapeo.

screens.AppPasscode.TurnOffPasscode.turn.message: Ungependa Kuzima Nambari ya siri ya Programu?

screens.AppPasscode.TurnOffPasscode.useP.message: Tumia Nambari ya siri ya Programu

screens.ObscurePasscode.description.message: Nambari ya siri Isiyojulikana ni kipengele cha usalama kinachokuruhusu kufungua Mapeo katika hali bandia ambayo huficha data yako yote. Kuweka Nambari ya siri Isiyojulikana kwenye skrini ya utangulizi kutaonyesha toleo tupu la Mapeo ambalo hukuruhusu kuunda uchunguzi wa maonyesho ambao hauhifadhiwi kwenye hifadhidata ya Mapeo.

screens.Setting.ProjectSettings.YourTeam.message: Create or Join a Project to invite devices
Waiting for Device to Accept Invite
Coordinators can invite devices, edit and delete data, and manage project details.
Participants can take and share observations. They cannot manage users or project details.

screens.Settings.CreateOrJoinProject.Joi.message: To join a project find a Coordinator of the project you wish to join. Tell them your device name and the Coordinator will send you an invite.

screens.Settings.CreateOrJoinProject.alr.message: You are already on a project. To create a new Project you must uninstall and reininstall CoMapeo.

screens.Settings.CreateOrJoinProject.ent.message: Enter a name for the Project

screens.Settings.CreateOrJoinProject.pro.message: A project is a secure container for your data. Only devices you invite can enter and share data with you. Create or Join a project in order to share data with other devices.

screens.Settings.YourTeam.inviteDeclined.message: This device has declined your invitation. They have not joined the project.
